org.interreg.docexplore.util
Interface ImageSource

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedImageSource, ByteImageSource, FileImageSource, MetaDataImageSource
public interface ImageSource
extends java.io.Serializable

Base interface for an image source. An image source targets an image with additional information relevant to the components that use it.

Author:
Burnett

Method Summary
 java.io.InputStream getFile()
          Returns a stream of the target image.
 java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
          Returns a buffered image representing the image targeted by this source.
 java.lang.String getURI()
          Returns a generic URI stream expliciting this source.
 boolean isValid()
          Returns a hint to whether or not subsequent method calls on this object will succeed.
 

Method Detail

getImage

java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a buffered image representing the image targeted by this source.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getFile

java.io.InputStream getFile()
Returns a stream of the target image. If the image is compressed, the stream should contain the compressed data.

getURI

java.lang.String getURI()
Returns a generic URI stream expliciting this source.

isValid

boolean isValid()
Returns a hint to whether or not subsequent method calls on this object will succeed. Even if this method returns true, calls to other methods may fail (return null in the case of getImage() and getFile()).
